ipu_ecc.h File Reference
CSL ARCH Module » M4 » ECC

This file contains the API prototypes for configuring ECC for ARM Cortex-M4. More...

Data Structures

struct  eccIpuMemCfgPrm
 Structure holding ECC configuration parameters of IPU L2RAM /L1Data / L1TAG Memory. More...
 

Macros

#define ECC_IPU_ERR_ONEBIT   (0x1U)
 Macros that can be used to clear different types of Errors in IPU L2RAM / L1Data / L1Tag Error Info. More...
 
#define ECC_IPU_ERR_TWOBIT   (0x4U)
 IPU L2RAM / L1Data / L1Tag Memory 2 bit ECC Error.
 
#define ECC_IPU_ERR_CODE   (0x2U)
 IPU L2RAM / L1Data / L1Tag Memory ECC Error in Code Area.
 
#define ECC_IPU_ERR_ALL
 IPU L2RAM / L1Data / L1Tag Memory All ECC Error : 1bit, 2bit and code ecc error.

Detailed Description

This file contains the API prototypes for configuring ECC for ARM Cortex-M4.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum eccIpuMemType

Enumerates the values used to represent IPU ECC Memory types.

Enumerator
ECC_IPU_MEM_TYPE_L2RAM 

IPU L2RAM ECC Memory Type

ECC_IPU_MEM_TYPE_L1DATA 

IPU L1DATA ECC Memory Type

ECC_IPU_MEM_TYPE_L1TAG 

IPU L1TAG ECC Memory Type

Function Documentation

int32_t ECCIPUMemClrErrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  eccErr,
uint32_t  memType 
)

This function will clear error status of the defined ECC Error for the defined ECC IPU Memory type.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address for IPU_UNICACHE_CFG register
eccErrEcc Error which needs to be cleared
memTypeECC IPU Memory Type For valid values refer enum eccIpuMemType_t
Returns
status STW_SOK: When the API clears the error successfully STW_EFAIL: When the API fails to clear error
void ECCIPUMemConfig ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
const eccIpuMemCfgPrm_t *  pCfgPrm 
)

This function configures ECC configuration parameters for IPU L2RAM /L1Data / L1TAG Memory.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address for IPU_UNICACHE_CFG register
pCfgPrmPointer which holds ECC configuration parameters for IPU L2RAM /L1Data / L1TAG Memory. Refer eccIpuMemCfgPrm_t for details on the structure.
Returns
None
void ECCIPUMemEnableEcc ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  eccEnable,
uint32_t  memType 
)

This function will enable/disable ECC in IPU L2RAM / L1DATA / L1TAG Memory for the defined ECC IPU Memory type.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address for IPU_UNICACHE_CFG register
eccEnableTo Enable/Disable ECC in IPU L2RAM / L1DATA / L1TAG Memory Valid values: TRUE or FALSE
memTypeECC IPU Memory Type For valid values refer enum eccIpuMemType_t
Returns
None
int32_t ECCIPUMemGetErrInfo ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t *  pErrAddr,
uint32_t  memType 
)

This function will return the IPU L2RAM / L1DATA / L1TAG Memory error information when 1 Bit or 2 Bit Error occurs for the defined ECC IPU Memory type.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address for IPU_UNICACHE_CFG register
pErrAddrPointer which hold Error Address when 1 Bit or 2 Bit Error occurs
memTypeECC IPU Memory Type For valid values refer enum eccIpuMemType_t
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
uint32_t ECCIPUMemGetErrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  memType 
)

This function will return IPU L2RAM / L1DATA / L1TAG Memory Error status when 1 Bit or 2 Bit Error occurs for the defined ECC IPU Memory type.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address for IPU_UNICACHE_CFG register
memTypeECC IPU Memory Type For valid values refer enum eccIpuMemType_t
Returns
Returns the IPU L2RAM / L1DATA / L1TAG Memory Error status when 1 Bit or 2 Bit Error occurs
